# cat-form-group



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property         | Attribute         | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             | Type                                           | Default  |
| ---------------- | ----------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------- | -------- |
| `requiredMarker` | `required-marker` | Whether the labels need a marker to shown if the forms fields are required or optional.<br />  By default, it is set to auto, it will display the mark depending on the number of required and optional fields: <br />  If there are more required, the optional will be marked. If there are less required, it will mark the required. | `"auto" \| "none" \| "optional" \| "required"` | `'auto'` |
